oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sharḥ Arbaʻīn ḥadīth Imām Nawawī : manuscript, undated
Sharḥ Arbaʻīn ḥadīth az Imām Nawawī
Sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn al-Nawawīyah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dalajī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad , 1555 or 6-1540 or 41
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Ibn Ḥāfiẓ Muḥammad Saʻīd Qādirī, Ḥāfiẓ Muḥammad Ḥusayn (former owner.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column framed within double red lines, from 15 (ff. 1r-16v) to 19 (ff. 17r-63v) lines per page, in black and red.
The name of the author appears in the introduction as Shams al-Dīn Abū al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻUthmānī al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Dalajī, who also compiled a commentary on al-Bukhārī's Ṣaḥīḥ.
According to the colophon (f. 95v), copied by Bahāʼ al-Dīn ibn al-Qādir.
On fly leaf 7: "ʻInāyat-i Mawlawī Ḥāfiẓ Ḥusayn ṣaḥib-i qibla (?) dar Makkah-ʼi Mukarrama li-ʻābid (?) Murtaḍá Ḥusayn dar sanah-ʼi 1247."

Ownership statement on f. 1r signed Ḥāfiẓ Muḥammad Ḥusayn ibn Ḥāfiẓ Muḥammad Saʻīd Qādirī ibn Ḥāfiẓ Ḥusayn Ṣanʻat Allāh Qādirī ibn Ḥājjī Mīrān Muḥammad Khalīl Qādirī ibn Shaykh Abū Muḥammad Qādirī ibn Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir Qādirī ibn Shaykh Niʻmat Allāh Qādirī ibn Shaykh Isḥāq Qādirī.
MS Arab SM4144. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nawawī--1233-1277
Hadith
